data.title: Leona Lewis welcomes first baby and reveals name with husband Dennis Jauch
data.meta_description: Leona Lewis announces the birth of her first child with husband Dennis Jauch and reveals their name.
data.text:
Virgin Radio

3 Aug 2022, 10:02

Leona Lewis announces the birth of her first child with husband Dennis Jauch and reveals their name.

The singer posted the news on Instagram with an aborable photo of herself, her husband and their new baby girl, who they have named Carmel Allegra.

In the caption, she wrote: “And then there were three 💗Our little Carmel Allegra arrived 22.7.22 🕊.”

Of course, the comments were flooded with messages from fans and friends congratulating the singer on her beautiful new baby.

Ru Paul’s Drag Race judge Michelle Visage commented: “CONGRATS”.

While a fan said: “Congratulations on your beautiful blessing.”

Another wrote: “I love her name 💓💓💓 so happy for you and your beautiful family.”

A fourth commented: “YAY! Congratulations on your beautiful baby princess 💗 💕”

Lewis had previously announced her pregnancy on the social media platform in March, with the caption: “Can’t wait to meet you in the Summer”.

The singer first shot to fame after winning series three of the X Factor and went on to have a successful career, with her debut records Spirit becoming one of the best-selling albums of the 2000s and the best-selling debut album by a female artist in the 21st century.

She married Jaunch in Italy in 2019 after nine years together, and now they are welcoming a wonderful new addition to their family.

Lewis previously revealed how tricky the early stages of her pregnancy had been, particularly as someone who suffers from Hashimoto’s disease.

Taking to Instagram, she shared a video of her paddling boarding with her dog and husband with the caption: “Spent time in nature with the pups and the bump this weekend [praying hands emoji] I had a really challenging first trimester, I’ll share more at some point for anyone who is going through the same.

“But I was severely ill and unable to leave the house. So promised myself when I could get out, I would spend more time in nature she’s truly healing x.”
